title: The Final Countdown: Amy Walter & Larry Sabato
description: National Editor for the Cook Political Report, Amy Walter, and Larry Sabato, Director of Politics at the University of Virginia, talk to Chuck about the race for the White House and the down-ballot contests to watch on election night.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
